data.question: What is the empirical formula of CuCl-bpy at 100 K?
What is the crystal system of CuBr-bpy?
At what temperature does CuI-bpy have the highest volume according to Table S3?
Is the space group of CuCl-bpy at 300 K I 41 / acd?
What is the main contribution to the T1 state in CuCl-bpy_100K according to Table S12?
Does CuBr-bpy exhibit negative thermal expansion along the c-axis?
What is the formula weight of CuI-bpy at 250 K?
What is the trend of copper valence in CuX-bpy (X = Cl, Br, I) according to the computational methodology section?
data.answer: The trend of copper valence decreases from CuCl-bpy to CuI-bpy

data.question: Is the emission intensity of CuCl-bpy reversible with temperature changes?
What method was used for the structure optimization in the computational methodology?
What is the role of SOC in CuCl-bpy according to DFT calculations?
data.answer: SOC increases with the shrinking of Cu...Cu distance, limiting the emission of the triplet state and increasing the possibility of RISC T1 → S1

data.question: Does the volume of CuI-bpy increase with temperature according to Table S3?
What is the main difference in the electronic absorption spectra between CuCl-bpy_100K and CuCl-bpy_300K?
data.answer: The energy gap between HOMO and LUMO decreases from CuCl-bpy_100K to CuCl-bpy_300K

data.question: Is the crystal system of CuI-bpy tetragonal at all measured temperatures?
What is the effect of temperature on the lattice parameters of CuCl-bpy?
data.answer: The lattice parameters increase with temperature

data.question: What is the space group of CuI-bpy at 300 K?
Does the emission intensity of CuBr-bpy increase with temperature?
What is the main contribution to the S1 state in CuCl-bpy_300K?
What is the effect of temperature on the Cu...Cu distance in CuCl-bpy?
data.answer: The Cu...Cu distance decreases with increasing temperature
